channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: How Mumbai man, posing as fake scientist, tried to sell nuclear ‘design’ to Iran firms
What is India Deep Tech Alliance that Nvidia has joined?
Zohran Mamdani isn’t alone. How Indian-origin politicians are slowly becoming more in the US
Tejashwi Yadav vs Satish Kumar, Maithili Thakur vs Binod Mishra… Unmissable contests in Phase 1 of Bihar polls
How Trump has given the US its two longest govt shutdowns in history
Explained in Graphics | How Zohran Mamdani plans to make New York a more affordable city
The new-age Jews of the West? When Hindu faith becomes a provocation
item.description: The call for Hindus to remain understated, invisible and compliant while celebrating their festivals, especially in foreign countries, is unsettling

item.title: China’s periphery diplomacy and the G2 chimera
item.description: It remains to be seen how China responds to attempts by the US to assert itself along China’s periphery, including in Pakistan, while paying lip service to a so-called G2

item.title: India-US defence deal confirms broader strategic picture beyond occasional setbacks
item.description: The recent India-US framework agreement is a significant step in strengthening bilateral ties and boosting industrial and technological cooperation in the defence sector. It affirms India as a priority partner in America's vision for a free and open Indo-Pacific

item.title: Trishul, Astra Shakti, and the rise of Rudra Brigades: How the armed forces are preparing for tomorrow’s wars
item.description: These exercises will test coordination and cohesion among the three services, as a display of how theatre commands could operate

item.title: Cold War reversed: How Russia’s superweapons are challenging Nato
item.description: It is the psychological warfare that Russian nuclear signalling has always sought to achieve—not just military victory

item.title: How Turkiye’s Uyghur resettlement plan is aiding China’s ethnic cleansing in East Turkistan
item.description: East Turkistan is the motherland of all Turkic peoples. Legitimising Uyghurs’ displacement would make Ankara responsible for the final destruction of the Turkic homeland itself
